R

RED - Static variable in class GraphicsLab.Colour
 
red - Variable in class GraphicsLab.Colour
the red component of this colour
render() - Method in class MushroomForest.RenderInstance
Called once a frame

Calls the rendering of the displayList specified displayListIndex with the specified position, rotation, scale, colour and texture
If texture is null then no texture will be drawn.

This method should be called between
GL11.glPushMatrix and GL11.glPopMatrix method calls
renderFrame() - Method in class GraphicsLab.GraphicsLab
Renders a single frame to the application's display.
RenderInstance - Class in MushroomForest
This class encapsulates a render instance.

renderInstances - Variable in class MushroomForest.MainScene

renderScene() - Method in class MushroomForest.MainScene

rightWingDisplayIndex - Static variable in class MushroomForest.Butterfly

run(int, String, float) - Method in class GraphicsLab.GraphicsLab
